description:
11.62 deflate
Apply deflate effect to the video.

This filter replaces the pixel by the local(3x3) average by taking into account
only values lower than the pixel.

It accepts the following options:

threshold0.description: Limit the maximum change for plane 0. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

threshold1.description: Limit the maximum change for plane 1. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

threshold2.description: Limit the maximum change for plane 2. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

threshold3.description: Limit the maximum change for plane 3. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

name: deflate

parameters.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
parameters.name: threshold0

parameters.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
parameters.name: threshold1

parameters.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
parameters.name: threshold2

parameters.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
parameters.name: threshold3

source:
11.62 deflate

Apply deflate effect to the video.

This filter replaces the pixel by the local(3x3) average by taking into account only values lower than the pixel.

It accepts the following options:

threshold0
threshold1
threshold2
threshold3

Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
